activity_differential: people walking through clothing store area
people carrying shopping bags in mall
description: Two people are walking through a shopping mall corridor, carrying shopping bags and passing by various clothing displays and mannequins. The camera follows their movement, tracking their progress down the corridor.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A person walking and swinging arms would not be holding a floor lamp, which is typically heavy and stationary; the relationship is physically implausible.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible
